items.content_html: A modern, lightweight React UI component library built with pure CSS. Offers customizable, plug-and-play components like glitch buttons, loaders, modals, and more - designed for creatives, developers, and artists who value performance, flexibility, and aesthetic detail.

Offers customizable, plug-and-play components like glitch buttons, loaders, modals, and more - designed for creatives, developers, and artists who value performance, flexibility, and aesthetic detail.

items.content_html: A lightweight and interactive To-Do List application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add and delete tasks with a simple and clean interface. Tasks are stored in local storage, so they remain available even after refreshing the page.
items.title: Shubhankar1211/Todo-list: A lightweight and interactive To-Do List application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This app allows users to add and delete tasks with a simple and clean interface. Tasks are stored in local storage, so they remain available even after refreshing the page.

items.content_html: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.
items.title: diesel-core/diesel: Diesel is a simple and lightweight HTTP server library for Bunjs, designed to give you control over your API routes and middleware in an intuitive and efficient way. With DieselJS, you can quickly set up a server, define routes, and optimize important routes for faster response times.

items.content_html: __Recent Tabs Grouper__ is a Chrome extension that helps power users manager browser clutter by grouping open tabs by domain and displaying the most recently accessed tabs. It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.

It features collapsible, tab groups, last activity timestamps, and one-click tab closing - all in a lightweight popup UI.
